cgcloud__Contract_Product__c.name: cgcloud__Contract_Product__c
cgcloud__Contract_Product__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between a customer contract and a product. With this object, you can capture product-specific agreements that are included in a customer contract.

cgcloud__Planned_Quantity__c.description: Incremental quantity that the tactic causes.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the customer contract product.
